title: No audio in calls. This happens periodically, factory reset did not fix it.
content:
Issue began 2 days ago, some of the incoming/outgoing phone calls have no audio on my end. Other side can hear me just fine while I hear nothing. 
This issue appears to occured periodically, some calls work ok, while others have no audio.

Tried cleaning cache, removing new apps, restarts and a factory reset. All without success.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
